title.narrative: Improving access to, and use of, sustainable WASH services in communities and health facilities in marginalised districts of Ethiopia, Malawi and Rwanda.

description.narrative: By April 2019, 143,704 people will have increased access to, and use of clean water, sanitation and hygiene in Ethiopia, Malawi and Rwanda. WaterAid will work with local partners to improve WASH facilities in communities and health facilities. Using project evidence, we will raise awareness and influence government at district/national levels, and advise upon the importance of WASH as integral to ensuring health outcomes for communities, with a focus upon mothers and new-borns.

mailing-address.narrative: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
